entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ARM64 Vector2 multiplication breaks in .NET 8 #98137
  • dump system log on macos when test run terminates unexpectedly #98132
  • runtime-official build broken for linux/sourcebuild #98130
  • NativeAOT result binary on macOS targets latest SDK #98124
  • Cross-platform, solutions and answers #98123
  • Mac OS X: System.Diagnostics.Process mis-reporting CPU usage (dramatically) on Apple Silicon #98121
  • [debugger][mt][browser] TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime times out #98110
  • [API Proposal]: Add IndexOfAny string[] overloads #98106
  • [API Proposal]: Support parsing server-sent events (SSE) with HttpClient response #98105
    9.0.0
  • [mt][browser] `HttpClient_CancelInDifferentThread` failing with operation cancelled #98101
    9.0.0
  • ARM64: redundant overflow and divbyzero checks #98100
    9.0.0
  • [aot] Library tests failures on Windows, assertion `elems <= MAX_VECTOR_ELEMS / 2' not met #98099
  • [browser] rename test scenario normal to WasmTestOnV8 #98092
    9.0.0
  • [browser][debugger] Firefox EvaluateOnCallFrame2Tests #98086
    9.0.0
  • [8.0] Expected exception not thrown in linux-musl arm64: System.Net.Quic.Tests.QuicStreamTests.WriteCanceled_NextWriteThrows #98078

Closed

  • XUnitLogChecker: Unable to find dumps in Linux #96818
    9.0.0
  • [Feature Request]: Only include packages when not provided by the framework #97937
  • String.Join Different results on different operating systems Windows/Linux #71990 #98116
  • Blazor WASM (8.0 RC2) does not work on iOS 15.8 #96748
    8.0.x
  • HttpClient send MultipartFormDataContent / Azure WAF Multipart request body failed strict validation #98089
  • [debugger][mt][browser] `TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` times out #98108
  • Vector512.Create doesn't work as expected #97924
    9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] StackFrameIterator.ShouldSkipRegularGcReporting is dead code #97620
  • Invalid codegen for custom IL with ldtoken #97949
    9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97513
    9.0.0
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector constructors using other vectors #97815
  • When compiling NativeAOT, is the deferred information stored in a PDB file with field pointers like in C++? #97346
    Future
  • [NativeAOT] NativeAOT Guide : How To Debug NativeAOT? NativeAOT Update Suggestions #97804
  • Json source generator compiler error using reserved property names and DefaultIgnoreCondition #98050
    9.0.0
  • System.Text.Json doesn't support KeyedCollection when serializing with source generation #97617
    Future
  • .NET 9 createdump crashes while creating coredumps #98023
  • SVE_GT_4A #98073
  • ValueType.Equals could short-circuit for reference equality #6421
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: Add custom error handling for BackgroundService #94403

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Add IF_SVE_GU_3*, IF_SVE_GX_3*, IF_SVE_FF_3*, IF_SVE_GY_3B #98136
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve, 9.0.0
  • Remove `GetDomain` functions on assorted method/type/assembly classes which are always in the single app domain #98135
    area-VM-coreclr
  • fix SendTo with SocketAsyncEventArgs #98134
    area-System.Net.Sockets, 9.0.0
  • Allow mono to reuse the shared memmove implementation #98133
    area-GC-mono
  • Fix TensorPrimitives.FusedMultiplyAdd #98131
    area-System.Numerics.Tensors, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Added more verbose error message when calling method using reflection and target type does not match passed type #98129
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • Fix missing short stack define #98128
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Add support for building CoreCLR for iOS/tvOS simulator #98127
    os-ios, community-contribution, needs-area-label
  • Ensure that the various `Max*Number` and `Min*Number` APIs optimize correctly #98125
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono] Don't pass c/c++ specific flags for .asm files on Windows #98122
    area-Build-mono
  • Support for WASI threads #98120
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-wasi
  • Ensure the IBinaryInteger.RotateLeft/Right DIMs use unsigned right shift #98119
    area-System.Numerics
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Use new MacOS arm64 pool for official builds #98117
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #98115
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics
  • ARM64: Optimize overflow and divbyzero checks with assertions #98113
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [debugger][mt][browser] Disable `TestDebugUsingMultiThreadedRuntime` that times out #98111
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • JIT: Generalize jump threading very slightly #98107
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Propagate installers in runtime output in VMR build #98104
    needs-area-label
  • Restore RSA 16384 tests to innerloop #98102
    area-System.Security, test-enhancement
  • JIT: Canonicalize loop exits #98096
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][mt] Enable `M.E.L.C.Test.SimpleConsoleFormatterTests.Log_WritingScopes_LogsWithCorrectColorsWhenColorEnabled` #98095
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser
  • Move wasm threading library tests job from runtime-extra-platforms to runtime #98094
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-browser
  • [browser] remove memory snapshot feature #98093
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Update Bionic docs #98088
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][wasi] Throw error when WasmBuildNative is explicitly set to false during a single-file build #98087
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-wasi
  • Add ARM64 encodings for group IF_SVE_CT_3A #98085
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable linker warning LNK4104 when building native AOT libraries #98084
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98082
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.x
  • [6.0] Add RIDs for Fedora 40 and Ubuntu 24.04 #98080
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [7.0] Add RIDs for Fedora 40 and Ubuntu 24.04 #98079
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [mono] Intrinsify LoadVector64x* and LoadVector128x* #98077
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Remove unused flag in Uri #98076
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Clear _cacheInvalid flag after rebuilding limiter cache in DefaultPartitionedRateLimiter #98075
    area-System.Threading, community-contribution
  • Add span-based Uri {Try}{Un}EscapeDataString overloads #98074
    area-System.Net, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Add internal nuget to package tasks, and targets for workload testing #98019
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [workloads] Also process the win-arm64 android cross packs #98061
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Use VM's copy of daccess.h #97751
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add Sve.IsSupported support #97814
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Disable vector ctors intrinsics on wasm #98114
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [browser][mt] Fix `package microsoft.netcore.app.runtime.mono.multithread.browser-wasm is not found` #98083
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono
  • Late cast expansion: remove the null check if possible #97234
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][debugger] Disabling tests failing on Firefox #98103
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Ensure that Vector512 uses the same patterns as Vector64/128/256 #97990
    area-System.Numerics
  • [Mono] [Arm64] Add SIMD support for vector ctors #98037
    area-Codegen-Intrinsics-mono
  • Improve Math.Round, Math.ILogB, and do some minor cleanup of Half, Single, and Double #98040
    area-System.Numerics
  • Use NetTool* TFM properties for msbuild tasks #98098
    area-Build-mono
  • Take into account the local involved in GT_SWITCH for resolution #97713
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove StackFrameIterator.ShouldSkipRegularGcReporting #98081
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Add encoding for ARM64 IF_SVE_CJ_2A instruction group #97885
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • BitCast<TYP_REF>(TypeHandleToRuntimeTypeHandle(clsHandle)) => nongc obj #97955
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][mt] Improve blocking wait detection and tests #98045
    area-VM-threading-mono, 9.0.0
  • [browser][mt] AsyncTransactionScopeTests.VerifyBYOTSyncTSNestedAsync - Value is not null #97977
    arch-wasm, disabled-test, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] withDumpThreadsOnNonZeroExit #98052
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • STJ: Skip usage of indexer for KeyedCollection #97734
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Fix STJ SG regression in handling of property names that are reserved keywords. #98058
    area-System.Text.Json, 9.0.0
  • Delete useless delegate virtual methods #97959
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Deduplicate LSDA data in the object writer #97972
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 6.0.28 #98056
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.17 #98057
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 8.0.3 #98059
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Remove strtok, strtok_s, wcstok_s PAL APIs #98008
    area-VM-coreclr

Updated

  • Add implementations for MakePointerType(), MakeArrayType() for GenericTypeParameterBuilder #97350
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Tests for ByRef generics and ByRef implementing interfaces #98070
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Always assign edge likelihoods in fgIncorporateProfileData #98054
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add build analysis config file to runtime #97465
    needs-area-label
  • JIT: stopping preference for ML CSE heuristic #98063
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: ARM64 SVE format encodings, `SVE_ID_2A` to `SVE_JH_2A` #98015
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-arm64-sve
  • Handle NativeOverlapped* coming from both the Windows or Portable thread pool in NativeRuntimeEventSource #97365
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Fix consistency issue in GetKeyedServices with AnyKey #97561
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Use 1MB fallback stack when procfs fails #83271
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Remove HELPER_METHOD_FRAMEs from built-in marshalers #97432
    area-Interop-coreclr
  • Fast field access #97784
    area-System.Reflection
  • Improved uninitialized object creation performance #98016
    area-System.Reflection, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Disable jiterpreter_do_jit_call to address issues with disabling Wasm EH on 8.0. #98051
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove CoreCLR math.h CRT PAL Redefines #98048
    area-Meta
  • Change stack size on all desktop platforms to at least 1.5MB #98007
    area-VM-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Remove built-in COM interop support from Mono runtime #97789
    area-Interop-mono
  • Update MicrosoftBuildVersion to latest #98006
    area-Infrastructure
  • Update diasymreader.native to 17.8.0-beta1.23475.2 #97356
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • JIT: Use faster write barriers when we know the target address is on the heap #97953
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Test #96806
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Fix interpreter #97935
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [WIP][mono][infra] Enable linux-x64 Mono fullAOT mini job on extra platforms #96332
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono, 9.0.0
  • Mark most specific static DIM for types marked RelevantToVariantCasting #97487
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [WIP][infra] Enable trimming on Helix for Apple mobile #96169
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [mono][ios] Enable fullAOT mode for runtime tests #92523
    area-Infrastructure-mono, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser] Use standard xunit test runner on multithreaded runtime #91317
    arch-wasm, test-enhancement, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Suppress unused variable warnings for PERFTRACING_DISABLE CMake vars #98004
    area-Build-mono
  • Do not use AllocHGlobal in Pkcs12Reader #97447
    area-System.Security
  • Update TensorPrimitives to vectorize for size(T) is 1 or 2 #97835
    area-System.Numerics
  • [NativeAOT] Convert operand of newarr to int when producing reverse P/Invoke array marshalling #98025
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [RISC-V] Skip ComputeReturnFlags in ArgIteratorTemplate::HasRetBuffArg #97877
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [browser] Fix debugger support #97213
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement HttpWebRequest AllowWriteStreamBuffering property #95001
    area-System.Net
  • Fix: unmanaged memory leak on parsing ill-formed certificates #93647
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] test GC #97970
    arch-wasm, area-GC-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [NativeAOT] Build support for linux-bionic-arm / linux-musl-arm #97996
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix Windows implementation of NegotiateAuthenticationPal.GetMIC #98031
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution, 8.0.x
  • [iOS] Introduce support for linking ICU libs #97216
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [NativeAOT][8.0] Use ld_classic in ILC build and in build integration #97856
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Allow valuetype sharing for more sizes. #97860
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [release/8.0-staging] Ensure that constant folding for SIMD shifts on xarch follow the correct behavior on overshift #98066
    Servicing-consider, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #97072
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #97071
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #97070
    Servicing-approved, area-codeflow
